summary: Bandits attack a wagonload of convicts, and only a sergeant, his daughter, and seven sadistic prisoners survive. The sergeant must get his prisoners to their destination while a web of lies, greed, and betrayal unfolds.
cast: Robert Hundar|Emma Cohen|Alberto Dalbés|Antonio Iranzo|Manuel Tejada|Ricardo Díaz|José Manuel Martín|Carlos Romero Marchent|Rafael Hernández|Eduardo Calvo|Lorenzo Robledo|Emilio Rodríguez|Xan das Bolas|Francisco Nieto|Antonio Padilla|Simón Arriaga|Juan Antonio Elices|Mabel Karr|Dan van Husen|Mel Welles
director: Director: Joaquín Luis Romero Marchent (as Joaquin Romero Marchent)
title: Condenados a vivir
